section.name: Unit 5 Taking Action: Equity Audit
section.summary:
This unit will provide steps for conducting an equity audit in your classroom or program. By the end of this unit, you will be able to:

  • Examine the ways bias can appear in adult education.
  • Reflect on the way individual bias affects students or programs.
  • Articulate an action step to ensure that bias is not affecting your work or program.

After you have completed the activities in this section, return to the main course page to begin the finial section, “Course Conclusion.”
